Smart Toothbrush with AI Technology: A toothbrush with built-in AI technology that tracks the user's brushing habits and provides personalized feedback on their technique and brushing time. It also keeps track of the user's toothpaste supply and reminds them to replace it when it runs out.

Toothbrush with Built-in Timer: A toothbrush with a built-in timer that alerts the user to switch to a new quadrant of their mouth after two minutes of brushing. This ensures that the user covers all areas of their mouth and prevents over-brushing.

Toothbrush with UV Sterilization: A toothbrush with UV sterilization technology that kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria on the bristles after each use. This is especially useful for people who are prone to oral infections or have weakened immune systems.

Toothbrush with Biodegradable Bristles: A toothbrush with biodegradable bristles made from natural materials such as bamboo or cornstarch. This is a more eco-friendly alternative to traditional plastic toothbrushes, which can take hundreds of years to decompose.

Toothbrush with Adaptive Pressure Sensing: A toothbrush with adaptive pressure sensing technology that adjusts the brushing pressure based on the user's individual needs. This is especially useful for people with sensitive teeth or gums, as it ensures that they are not applying too much pressure during brushing.
